mapper.select: select pid, pname, posts, target_number, enrolled_number, location, release_date, project_date, service_object, volunteer_upport, recruit_date, service_description, project_details, teamid, project_status, post_desc, post_condition, post_name, target_num, mark from charity.volunteer_program_detailscensor where pid = #{pid}

select pid, pname, posts, target_number, enrolled_number, location, release_date, project_date, service_object, volunteer_upport, recruit_date, service_description, project_details, teamid, project_status, post_desc, post_condition, post_name, target_num, mark from charity.volunteer_program_detailscensor limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into charity.volunteer_program_detailscensor(pname, posts, target_number, enrolled_number, location, release_date, project_date, service_object, volunteer_upport, recruit_date, service_description, project_details, teamid, project_status, post_desc, post_condition, post_name, target_num, mark) values (#{pname}, #{posts}, #{targetNumber}, #{enrolledNumber}, #{location}, #{releaseDate}, #{projectDate}, #{serviceObject}, #{volunteerUpport}, #{recruitDate}, #{serviceDescription}, #{projectDetails}, #{teamid}, #{projectStatus}, #{postDesc}, #{postCondition}, #{postName}, #{targetNum}, #{mark})
mapper.update:
update charity.volunteer_program_detailscensor
pname = #{pname},
posts = #{posts},
target_number = #{targetNumber},
enrolled_number = #{enrolledNumber},
location = #{location},
release_date = #{releaseDate},
project_date = #{projectDate},
service_object = #{serviceObject},
volunteer_upport = #{volunteerUpport},
recruit_date = #{recruitDate},
service_description = #{serviceDescription},
project_details = #{projectDetails},
teamid = #{teamid},
project_status = #{projectStatus},
post_desc = #{postDesc},
post_condition = #{postCondition},
post_name = #{postName},
target_num = #{targetNum},
mark = #{mark},
where pid = #{pid}
